pr_title: Sort traces within ListWriter by start time before asserting

timeline.message:
Sort traces within ListWriter by start time before asserting

Uses the `PendingTrace.startNanoTicks` to provide the greatest precision.

Remove indexes from trace and span assert declaration

Instead rely strictly on declaration order.
Apply Idea formatting to various groovy files

Apply reordering and index removal to tests

Including removal of various methods attempting to resort the trace list.
Improve Couchbase test cleanup
Improve Couchbase test cleanup
Fix for Java 7
Increase test timeout

jacoco should ignore new test assert classes

We should probably add proper tests for these at some point.
Ignore additional traces from Spring JMS Listener test.
Make elasticsearch cleanup more reliable
Make elasticsearch cleanup more reliable

Don't reference specific traces in TEST_WRITER

Since the traces are sorted before asserting, but the change isn't reflected in the TEST_WRITER, we should reference the sorted traces instead.
Add couchbase span sorting
Add couchbase span sorting

Don't reference specific traces in TEST_WRITER

Since the traces are sorted before asserting, but the change isn't reflected in the TEST_WRITER, we should reference the sorted traces instead.

Don't reference specific traces in TEST_WRITER

Since the traces are sorted before asserting, but the change isn't reflected in the TEST_WRITER, we should reference the sorted traces instead.
Fix index of a couple reordered spans
Fix index of a couple reordered spans
More ES test fixes

timeline.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: The reason I added the latch first is to avoid the risk of a race condition where you check and it's not there, but then it gets added before the latch is added. Would you prefer a double (before and after) isReported check?
replies.author: tylerbenson
